# Reports Indices

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("End of Year Reports 2022-2023",
               "Mid-Year Reports 2022-2023",
               "End of Year Contact Lead Reports 2021-2022",
               "End of Year Reports 2021-2022",
               "ANA Reports 2021-2022",
               "Mid-Year Reports 2021-2022",
               "Mississippi Reports",
               "End of Year Reports 2020-2021"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_all_sites.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_all_sites.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/ContactLeads2122/EndofYearContactLeadSurvey.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2021-2022/final_report_all_partners.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/ANA_21_22/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_104_ny.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/Midyear/2021-2022-tl-report_All Partners.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/Mississippi/April/Mississippi_reports_april.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2020-2021/mid_year_report.png")),
  link = c("end_year_reports_22_23.html",
           "mid_year_reports_22_23.html",
           "end_of_year_contact_leads_21_22.html",
           "end_of_year_21_22.html",
           "ana_reports_21_22.html",
           "mid_year_reports_21_22.html",
           "mississippi_reports.html",
           "end_of_year_20_21.html")
)

report_galleries |>
  cards(
    title = "Reports",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
